type ToolboxComponentsCreatingEventHandler = delegate of obj * ToolboxComponentsCreatingEventArgs -> unit

span.span: A that provides data for the event.

summary.span: 表示 事件的处理方法。

span.span: Represents the method that handles the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例提供了一个方法，该方法附加了 的 事件的事件处理程序，以及一个 事件处理程序方法，该方法在事件处理程序由 事件引发时，该方法将接收新组件或组件的组件类型名称写入到 。The following example code provides a method that attaches an event handler for the event of a , and a event handler method that writes the name of the type of the component that is to receive the new component or components to the when the event handler is raised by a event. [!code-cpp[MoreEventHandlerExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MoreEventHandlerExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[MoreEventHandlerExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MoreEventHandlerExamples/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[MoreEventHandlerExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/MoreEventHandlerExamples/VB/form1.vb#3)]
